snippet: The investigation involves academic violations at the University of North Carolina.
abstract: NCAA announces that it is reopening investigation into whether University of North Carolina athletics program violated rules in connection with a department that held dozens of bogus classes that distributed inflated grades to athletes; inquiry concerns university's football and men's basketball programs in one of the largest academic scandals in college sports.
lead_paragraph: The investigation involves academic violations at the University of North Carolina.

headline.main: N.C.A.A. Is Reopening Inquiry Into Academic Violations at North Carolina
headline.print_headline: N.C.A.A. Is Reopening Inquiry Into Academic Violations at North Carolina
